pages.text: $(li)The Backpack allows to you to have an extra inventory.$(br)$(li)It can be enchanted with $(l:patchouli:enchanting/backpacked/looted)Looted$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/backpacked/repairman)Repairman$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/backpacked/imbued_hide)Imbued Hide$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/backpacked/funnelling)Funnelling$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/backpacked/marksman)Marksman$(/l).
$(li)To use the Backpack, first you have to open your inventory, access to the Curios API menu and equip the Backpack in the Backpack slot.

$(li)Once equipped, you can press the B key to access the Backpack inventory with 45 extra slots to save your items.$(br)$(li)You will not be able to unequip your Backpack if this one contains at least 1 item.$(br)$(li)Like other containers, you can filter items to find them easily and sort the items in its interior too.

$(li)You can click the Customize button to acces a new GUI that allows you change the aspect of your Backpack.$(br)$(li)On the top, you have 3 checkboxs to allow or disallow to show the Enchantment Glint, show Elytras, and show Backpack Effects while you have the Backpack equipped.$(br)$(li)In the middle, you can select multiple different cosmetic designs for you Backpack.
$(li)You will have to complete specific challenges to unlock the Locked Backpack designs.
